comment._content:
Rube Marquard 
Richard William Marquard Bats Both, Throws Left 
Height 6' 3", Weight 180 lb. 
 Debut September 25, 1908 
Final Game September 18, 1925 
Born October 9, 1886 in Cleveland, OH 
Died June 1, 1980 in Baltimore, MD 
Inducted into the Hall of Fame in 1971.

Died September 19, 1977 in Cleveland, OH
